short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness the emotional side of *Scaramouche* from *Genshin Impact* with this powerful live wallpaper for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colorize your Chrome browser with a live wallpaper featuring Scaramouche from Genshin Impact. This extension includes convenient shortcuts and a clock for your daily needs. Enjoy!
